description: Tasked with helping pay off their employer's debt, explorers Olimar and Louie team up with Pikmin (including purple and white Pikmin) to collect treasure on a strange planet. Time ticks away on the surface, but cave systems let you take your time to let your strategy blossom.

v0.2.3r2.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**

## Changelog
- Add two commands to the client:
  - /force_relink - Force a relink if linking fails for some reason
  - /status - Check current game status and goal
- Add docstrings to YAML file to better explain what the options do
- Add more descriptive messages in the client during the linking process
- Add an extra check in the linking process that should reduce the chances of faulty links

## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures
v0.2.3r2.title: v0.2.3

v0.3.0r2.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**
**NOTE 2: Games generated on earlier versions will NOT work on this version.**

## Changelog
- Add cave shuffling
  - Includes options to keep Dream Den in its location, keep Wistful Wild caves in Wistful Wild, and fully shuffle all caves
  - Submerged Castle is excluded for now due to the hard-coded Blue Pikmin only requirement
  - If enabled, adds Violet Candypop Buds outside Emergence Cave and Ivory Candypop Buds in Awakening Wood by the ship
- Add a command to the client
  - /cave \<cave\> - Tells you what \<cave\> has been randomized to.
- Add deathlink
  - Deaths are sent when a Pikmin extinction occurs (that causes the day to end) or both captains are down. 
  - Includes options for how received deaths are processed. They can either kill all active Pikmin, kill a captain, or randomly select one of these two.
- Add boss randomization
  - Includes options to shuffle all bosses and randomize them completely
  - Titan Dweevil is excluded from this pool
- Add onion shuffle
  - The water around the Blue Onion is removed
  - The electric gate blocking access to the Blue Onion is changed to a normal gate if it is blocking the Yellow Onion
- Quality of life changes
  - Yellow/Blue Onion discovery cutscenes no longer play
  - Captain reunite cutscene no longer plays
  - Captains are now considered reunited after the first switch to Louie, so he can access Olimar's Pikmin before the bag is crushed on Day 1
- Fixed a bug where the Off-World Item still had the Doomsday Apparatus' collision :)

## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures. This commonly happens with whatever is in the Utter Scrap location. Entering Emergence Cave before collecting it usually avoids the crash.
v0.3.0r2.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.1r2.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**
**NOTE 2: If you downloaded v0.3.0 already, you can just download the new .apworld file, you don't need to download the whole zip again.**
**NOTE 3: If you downloaded this before 7/28/2025 at 4:12 AM UTC, your release has a bug in it. The bug was small enough and it hasn't been long enough for me to make a whole new release, but I wanted to fix it now. Please redownload the .apworld file.**

## Changelog
- Fixed a bug where getting AP items in a shuffled cave would cause the item from the vanilla cave to be marked
- Renamed some YAML options since they were causing unintended side effects

## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures. This commonly happens with whatever is in the Utter Scrap location. Entering Emergence Cave before collecting it usually avoids the crash.
v0.3.1r2.title: v0.3.1 (fixed)

v0.4.0r2.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**
**NOTE 2: Games generated on earlier versions will NOT work on this version.**

## Changelog
- Fix a bug where Red Candypop Buds could still spawn even if Red Pikmin weren't unlocked
- Fix a bug where Queen Candypop Buds could still be red even if Red Pikmin weren't unlocked
  - They are now white by default, which can cause a small issue where they don't turn red at all
- Overhaul generation logic to make it cleaner and to fix multiple bugs with generation, including:
  - Issues with cave shuffle logic
  - Issues where unbeatable minimal logic seeds were generated
  - Spoiler log spheres not generating properly
- Add new onion shuffle option, exclude_vanilla, that guarantees onions will not all be in their vanilla locations
- Add an option that lets you modify the debt (from 1-15000 Pokos)
- Change the setup file from a JSON to an .appik2 file, and rename it to the proper format for the Archipelago server. **_This means you no longer have to remove the setup file from the output zip to host!_**
- Fix a crash that could occur in Awakening Wood if the Red Pikmin introduction cutscene played there
- Change how progress is restored when resuming a game. The pikmin2\_game_\<seed>.txt file is no longer used; instead, the client reads the received items directly from the save file.
  - This means that, if you close the game/crash before receiving an item properly, the item will be resent next time you open the game.
- Fix a bug where Pokos were obtained even though no items were received, by slightly changing the way items are received. This should hopefully fix the bug, but it is hard to reproduce so I'm not entirely sure it did.
- Change the classification of most items:
  - The Spherical Atlas and Geographic Projection are progression + useful
  - The rest of the Explorer Kit treasures are progression
  - The non-Explorer Kit treasures are progression + deprioritized
- Clogs are removed from caves that normally appear in Wistful Wild
- Change the Doomsday Apparatus to weigh 200 instead of 1000
  - This may have been done in the previous version and I forgot to put it in the changelog...oops

## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures. This commonly happens with whatever is in the Utter Scrap location. Entering Emergence Cave before collecting it usually avoids the crash.
- Queen Candypop Buds sometimes show up as white instead of red, even if you have Red Pikmin unlocked. This means that you can't use them to generate Red Pikmin, but you can use them to generate White Pikmin.
v0.4.0r2.title: v0.4.0

v0.5.0r2.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**
**NOTE 2: Games generated on earlier versions will NOT work on this version.**

## Changelog
- Fix a bug where multiworlds could not be generated if certain games were part of the world (notably KH1)
- Fix a bug in logic where impossible seeds had a rare chance to be generated
- Add onion shuffle option that allows the onions to be in the item pool
  - Onion Marble models by fracta1fa1th
- Add an option to turn progressive globes on/off (previously it was always on)
- Add a cave keys option
  - If enabled, caves need a key to unlock. Getting a cave's key unlocks the cave's vanilla location.
- Fix a bug where cave's vanilla name/hazards would be loaded instead of the cave that was shuffled to that location
  - This does NOT apply to the world map or save file screens, but everything should work fine in/outside the cave
- Add Submerged Castle to the cave shuffle pool
  - The cave's new location will only allow Blue Pikmin to enter
  - The cave's vanilla location has the water around it removed
- Remove the Piklopedia and Treasure Hoard
- Fix a bug where starting items that were randomized to overworld locations would crash the game
- Add a "Last Treasure Received" counter to the HUD (appears on Day 2)
- Add new option: Weapons In Pool
  - Shuffles the Titan Dweevil's weapons into the pool. If a weapon is collected outside the fight, it will be permanently removed from the fight.
- Fix a bug where the client would sometimes not prompt the user for the save folder path
 
## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures. This commonly happens with the first treasure you pick up on Day 2, usually whatever is in the Utter Scrap location. Entering a cave before collecting it usually avoids the crash.
- Queen Candypop Buds sometimes show up as white instead of red, even if you have Red Pikmin unlocked. This means that you can't use them to generate Red Pikmin, but you can use them to generate White Pikmin.
- Whatever cave is in Submerged Castle's location will always have the vanilla Submerged Castle music
- Sometimes starting items will not be received properly, if this happens usually restarting the game and client causes them to appear
- Sometimes the Pikmin can't break gates in caves. Usually resetting the cave fixes this.
v0.5.0r2.title: v0.5.0

v0.6.0r3.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**
**NOTE 2: Games generated on earlier versions will NOT work on this version.**

## Changelog
- Add beta Linux support and Linux setup instructions to the documentation. Please reach out if you encounter any issues with this!
- Add enemy randomization option
- Add option to randomize bosses and enemies together
- Add a sublevel shuffle option (NEVER MIND THIS IS CURRENTLY BROKEN)
- Fix a bug where Violet and Ivory Candypop Buds would not spawn when caves were not randomized but cave keys were enabled
- Modify some client checks to hopefully fix connection/sync bugs
 
## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures. This commonly happens with the first treasure you pick up on Day 2, usually whatever is in the Utter Scrap location. Entering a cave before collecting it usually avoids the crash.
- Queen Candypop Buds sometimes show up as white instead of red, even if you have Red Pikmin unlocked. This means that you can't use them to generate Red Pikmin, but you can use them to generate White Pikmin.
- Whatever cave is in Submerged Castle's location will always have the vanilla Submerged Castle music
- Sometimes starting items will not be received properly, if this happens usually restarting the game and client causes them to appear
- Sometimes the Pikmin can't break gates in caves. Usually resetting the cave fixes this.
v0.6.0r3.title: v0.6.0

v0.6.1r2.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**
**NOTE 2: Games generated on earlier versions will NOT work on this version.**

## Changelog
- Fix a bug where sublevel shuffle would cause treasures to be improperly logged by the Archipelago client
- Add slot data for the tracker
- Add get_pre_fill_items hook to help pass unit tests
 
## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures. This commonly happens with the first treasure you pick up on Day 2, usually whatever is in the Utter Scrap location. Entering a cave before collecting it usually avoids the crash.
- Queen Candypop Buds sometimes show up as white instead of red, even if you have Red Pikmin unlocked. This means that you can't use them to generate Red Pikmin, but you can use them to generate White Pikmin.
- Whatever cave is in Submerged Castle's location will always have the vanilla Submerged Castle music
- Sometimes starting items will not be received properly, if this happens usually restarting the game and client causes them to appear
- Sometimes the Pikmin can't break gates in caves. Usually resetting the cave fixes this.
v0.6.1r2.title: v0.6.1

v0.7.0r2.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**
**NOTE 2: Games generated on earlier versions will NOT work on this version.**

## Changelog
- Add support for WebWorld hosting (thank you Red for suggesting + helping with this)
- Add new option: Treasure Checks
  - Adds checks at certain user-defined treasure intervals
- Add new option: Poko Checks
  - Adds checks at 10%, 20%, 30%, etc. of the debt
- Add Spicy and Bitter Sprays to the pool as filler items
  - They show up in-game as normal AP items
- Add better error messages for the client during linking
- Fix a bug where the patcher would close if it encountered an error without letting the user see what the error was
- Fix a bug where Volatile Dweevils were able to hold treasure but not drop them

## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures. This commonly happens with the first treasure you pick up on Day 2, usually whatever is in the Utter Scrap location. Entering a cave before collecting it usually avoids the crash.
- Queen Candypop Buds sometimes show up as white instead of red, even if you have Red Pikmin unlocked. This means that you can't use them to generate Red Pikmin, but you can use them to generate White Pikmin.
- Whatever cave is in Submerged Castle's location will always have the vanilla Submerged Castle music
- Sometimes starting items will not be received properly, if this happens usually restarting the game and client causes them to appear
- Sometimes the Pikmin can't break gates in caves. Usually resetting the cave fixes this.
v0.7.0r2.title: v0.7.0

v0.7.1.description:
**NOTE: This mod is still in the testing phase. Play at your own risk.**

## Changelog
- Add manifest file
- Fix a bug causing treasure collection and poko collection checks to not work as intended and cause extremely slow generation times (thank you to Mysteryem for discovering the bug and helping to fix it)

## Known Bugs
- Game will occasionally crash when loading the next day after the debt is repaid
- Game will occasionally crash upon picking up certain treasures. This commonly happens with the first treasure you pick up on Day 2, usually whatever is in the Utter Scrap location. Entering a cave before collecting it usually avoids the crash.
- Queen Candypop Buds sometimes show up as white instead of red, even if you have Red Pikmin unlocked. This means that you can't use them to generate Red Pikmin, but you can use them to generate White Pikmin.
- Whatever cave is in Submerged Castle's location will always have the vanilla Submerged Castle music
- Sometimes starting items will not be received properly, if this happens usually restarting the game and client causes them to appear
- Sometimes the Pikmin can't break gates in caves. Usually resetting the cave fixes this.
v0.7.1.title: v0.7.1
